about_the_game:
Discreet is designed to be played by three players. It consists of two roles: the thief and the owner. The thief and their accomplice must steal as many objects as possible without being detected by the owner. They can hide in the closets and then bring the stolen items back to their truck.

  • On the other hand, the owner must protect their house by setting up traps to catch the thieves. They also have the ability to capture a thief to eliminate them from the game. The owner can check the closets to detect the presence of a thief inside.
  • The game depicts a race against time between the thieves, who strive to steal discreetly, and the owner, who tries to stop them. Strategy and the ability to act with discretion are crucial for the thieves, while vigilance and trap-setting are necessary for the owner.
